name: Casa Magna - Connecticut - Robusto
additionalNotes: Casa Magna has had many lines over the years, but never a Connecticut shade wrapped line...until now. Casa Magna Connecticut is made in the Dominican Republic and uses an Ecuadorian Connecticut wrapper to encase a mix of Nicaraguan long-fillers creating a robust and intense profile that is capable of involving the totality of the palate. This full-bodied treasure offers up notes of subtle sweet woodiness, toast, earth and pepper.Â
